attributes.action: To get the BBC to Put the series Mongrels back on BBC Three
attributes.additional_details:
The BBC are a complete joke we pay a Fortune for our tv licence to pay them why take programs off air that we so love and enjoy.I understand that times are hard but people dont want to be reminded of it when they work all day they want to relax to the programs they enjoy.
enough is enough if the BBC dont sort this issue out I refuse to pay my tv licence.

rejection.details: It is a long-standing principle that the Government does not interfere in programme matters, either on arrangements for scheduling or on content. It is important to maintain the principle of freedom of expression which political interference could undermine.
